conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric conversion with clear wall geometry and depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D transformation with clearly defined thicknesses and planes.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout matches perfectly; wall proportions and openings are highly accurate.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture matches the 2D plan types and locations nearly perfectly, including kitchen/bath fixtures.

visual_clarity.notes: Extremely clean rendering with consistent lighting and no structural artifacts.

detected_errors.description: The orientation of the sliding doors near the dining area differs slightly from the swing/opening indicated on the plan.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D isometric conversion that faithfully replicates the room layout, wall geometry, and furniture placement of the 2D plan.
